subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wright, the Mets’ captain, reportedly admonished the pitching prospect Noah Syndergaard for eating lunch during an intrasquad game, a type of leadership he may have to show more of on a youthful team.
snippet: Wright, the Mets’ captain, reportedly admonished the pitching prospect Noah Syndergaard for eating lunch during an intrasquad game, a type of leadership he may have to show more of on a youthful team.
